ALTER TABLE [HPDM].[dbo].[PDM_CONTRACT_FULL] 
DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS [KEY_CONTRACT_FULL_PK_new];

ALTER TABLE [HPDM].[dbo].[PDM_CONTRACT_FULL] ADD  CONSTRAINT [KEY_CONTRACT_FULL_PK_new] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED 
(
	[KEY_CONTRACT] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
